section_title: Annex I parties undergoing the process of transition to a market economy
sentences: During informal consultations, parties discussed a draft COP 17 decision presented by Annex I countries with economies in transition, addressing, inter alia , low-emission economic growth.

Annex I parties whose special circumstances have been recognized by the COP: In informal consultations, parties exchanged views on Turkey s concerns about the current categorization of parties under the Convention.
